content:
In order to bring people closer to Mother Nature, we're tapping into your collective creative social media genius to bring you a special online project via Vine and Twitter.
 
Here's how it works:
	Tune in to our Twitter page every Tuesday for the week's challenge. Upload your Vine videos to Vine and Twitter with the hashtag #MotherNatureVine. And don't forget to mention us! Find us on Twitter: @MotherNatureNet and on Vine: @MotherNatureNetwork.
 
Every Friday, we will tweet our favorite videos with the tag #FeaturedFriday. Be sure to visit this page often as we will feature the best of the best for each challenge. Winners will receive great books on sustainability, organic food, green energy, eco-travel, and tales from the natural world. Want to get started? Check out the examples below & start your Vines now. 
 
Examples: 



 
We're looking forward to seeing your best 6 seconds of nature!
title: Join our #MotherNatureVine project!
